job_tasks.phrase: helpt bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly refers to the act of training generative AI models, which is a core component of the Modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: helpen geavanceerde generatieve AI-modellen betere code te schrijven
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of assisting generative AI models to improve their code generation capabilities, which falls under the scope of model training and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: interactie vereisen met deze modellen terwijl ze leren coderen
job_tasks.justification: This indicates direct interaction with AI models during their learning process, which is a form of model training and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen
job_tasks.justification: Creating and answering computer science-related questions is a method used to provide feedback and guide the training of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking AI-generated code is a direct form of feedback used to train and improve the models.

soft_skills.phrase: Er is geen eerdere ervaring met AI vereist.

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly focuses on training generative AI models and improving their code generation capabilities through direct interaction and feedback. Phrases like 'helpen geavanceerde generatieve AI-modellen betere code te schrijven' and 'evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd' strongly align with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
